Player History
Released by Cleveland on 3/2/1965...
Drafted in 2nd round, 32nd overall pick, by Atlanta in 1968...
Traded from Atlanta to Pittsburgh on 3/2/1968 (Going to ATL: C D. Pick. Going to PIT: LF T. Paciorek)...
Injured on 4/15/1969 with a Strained Groin Muscle, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1970, off Paul Edmondson (LA)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/11/1970, off Rick Wise (LA)...
Injured on 10/2/1973 with a Inflamed Groin Muscle, out for one week...
Signed as a free agent by Texas on 2/14/1976 to a 1-year deal worth $1,000,000 per year...
